Up to a maximum of 30,000 damage.
Requires at least 1 stack of Storm Shard to deal damage.
Hurl a Storm Shard at the target.
Stack 75%-95% ability damage on the target.
Stack 25%-32% damage in PvP.
Trigger all stacked damage by using the Shatter ability.
Maximum of 10 stacks.
Invoke a butterfly that heals you.
Heal 8% of your Life Points every 1.8s.
9s duration, unless the butterfly is destroyed by enemies.
Use the targets power against them.
Store incoming damage over 6s, or until Reprisal is cast again.
Then deal 100% of the damage stored back at the target.
Can cause up to 10,000 damage (25,000 damage in PvP).
In PvP there are diminishing returns on the damage dealt as stored damage increases.
Assault the target with unbridled power.
Initial hit deals 50%-150% ability damage.
Each subsequent hit adds 33% damage for 26 hits.
Channeled attack.
Each hit costs 25% adrenaline.
Will damage you for 25% of damage dealt when out of adrenaline.
Will deal an additional 1,000 damage to you after 10 hits.
Summon a healing crystal.
Heal anyone near the crystal for 1%-7% of their maximum Life Points every 3.6s.
Healing percentage is based on proximity to the crystal.
The crystal has a capacity of 300% of your maximum Life Points.
21.6s duration, or until the crystal capacity is drained.
Dive forward.
Instantly move to selected tile.
Max 10 tile range.
Revolution mode will not trigger this ability.
Leap backwards to maintain range.
Leap back 1 tile short of the maximum range of your ranged weapon.
Leap 7 tiles if you don't have a ranged weapon equipped.
(With double Escape unlocked:) This ability has a max of 2 charges.
Teleport forward.
Instantly teleport 10 tiles in a straight line ahead.
(With double Surge unlocked:) This ability has a max of 2 charges.
